certifications.title: Getting started with Front-End and Web Development

projects.name: E-COMMERCE WEBSITE (MyOwnstore)
projects.description: Developed a fully responsive e-commerce website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, providing an optimal user experience across various devices. Executed a real-time product listing integration using JavaScript, which enhanced user experience and minimized latency. Designed and the website's user interface (UI) , focusing on a clean and intuitive layout to enhance user engagement. Integrated a functional shopping cart system with JavaScript, allowing users to add, remove, and purchase items efficiently.

projects.name: RESPONSIVE COFFEE SHOP WEBSITE
projects.description: Responsive website for a coffee shop using HTML, CSS, JavaScript. Created an intuitive user interface (UI) that highlights the brands identity, enhancing user engagement and customer retention. Optimized the website for performance and speed , ensuring fast load times and a smooth browsing experience across all major browsers.

projects.name: RIDE SHARING APP ONBOARDING DESIGN
projects.description: User-friendly onboarding UI for a ride-sharing app , focusing on simplicity and ease of use to enhance first- time user engagement. Utilized modern design principles and visual hierarchy to create a visually appealing interface that aligns with the brands identity. Conducted usability testing and iterated designs based on user feedback to ensure an optimal onboarding experience for diverse user demographics.
